__e: Whatever you could do, I'll be forever grateful.
And yesterday, a certain princess may or may not have seen much of your world with a certain man, and she certainly might be eternally grateful.
And, for the gift I gave you, you'll be eternally grateful.
You've saved my little scumbag of my brother's life, and for that I'll always be grateful.
For what you've done for my father I will always be grateful to you.
I mean, I know how hard it was for you to leave Harvey for me, and I am forever grateful.
